itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, September 4, 2013
description: Workers in Volkswagen's factory in Tennessee are expected to hear this week about a bid to give them a greater voice with management. And a look at how your social media presence could affect your credit rating.
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, September 4, 2013
byline: Shannon Mullen, Claire Simms, Ryan Vasquez, Paddy Hirsch, Sara Evans, Bruce Johnson, Adrienne Hill, David Brancaccio and Shilpa Kannan
teaser: Workers in Volkswagen's factory in Tennessee are expected to hear this week about a bid to give them a greater voice with management. And a look at how your social media presence could affect your credit rating.
